survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Subscription-Based Skincare Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and satisfaction levels regarding subscription-based skincare services, including delivery frequency, product customization, and pricing models.

questions.question_text: How often do you currently use a subscription-based skincare service?
answer_options: I do not currently use a subscription service
questions.client_notes: Ensure answer options cover common subscription frequencies. Mobile-friendly radio buttons recommended.

script.question_text: How often do you currently use a subscription-based skincare service?
answer_options: I do not currently use a subscription service

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a skincare subscription service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select question with realistic priorities. Checkboxes recommended with max 3 selections enforced.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes with limit of 3)

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a skincare subscription service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: What is your preferred price range for a monthly skincare subscription?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'I do not currently use a subscription service' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Price ranges should reflect market reality. Slider or radio buttons acceptable.

script.question_text: What is your preferred price range for a monthly skincare subscription?
script.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'I do not currently use a subscription service' to Q1

questions.question_text: Describe your ideal skincare subscription customization options.
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'I do not currently use a subscription service' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative insights. Mobile-friendly text box with character limit (500 chars).

script.question_text: Describe your ideal skincare subscription customization options.
script.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'I do not currently use a subscription service' to Q1

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in add-on services like virtual dermatologist consultations for an additional fee?
answer_options: I prefer free basic guidance only
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with neutral option. Useful for premium service development.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in add-on services like virtual dermatologist consultations for an additional fee?
answer_options: I prefer free basic guidance only
